column1: '''Daniel Falconer''' is a [[Weta Workshop]] designer who has worked on both [[The Lord of the Rings (film series)
column2: ''The Lord of the Rings'']] and [[The Hobbit (film series)
column3: ''The Hobbit'' films]]. He has also authored various [[Weta Workshop]] publications.
